name: Circlr
description:
Note

This won't work on Safari! Since this game was made for phones it's a bit awkward with the controls and buttons. And some info is wrong but I don't have the source files to be able change it (like my name and links, sorry about that).

Description

A short arcade-ish game I made with Godot a couple of years ago. I first created for mobiles and I basically directly exported to the web now. I tried to keep the mechanics as simple as possible since it's a mobile game.

The controls
  • K to turn
  • L to shoot
